title: Xiaomi 12 series launches globally w/ $649 start price, more
content:
After launching first in China at the end of 2021, the Xiaomi 12 series has now been officially unveiled for global markets.

moreâ€¦

The post Xiaomi 12 series launches globally w/ $649 start price, more appeared first on 9to5Google.
description: The Xiaomi 12 series consists of three device, and after launching in China, it is now available in global markets starting at $649.
